name: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Ambulance
name_original: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Ambulance
description:
Road Hero Speed Car Racing Ambulance is an arcade racing game. 

Drive your ambulance car through superbly stunning roads, collect coins, avoid traffic cars.

KEY FEATURES OF ROAD HERO SPEED CAR RACING AMBULANCE ARE-

- Easy intuitive gameplay! - Interesting Story! - Lots of Coins to collect! - Avoid Collisions with traffic! - Race through exciting tracks! - Experience thrilling audio and visual effects!

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to steer the vehicle.

Up to accelerate the vehicle.

P to Pause, Q to Un-Pause the game.
